傑尼斯天團嵐出道20週年 將旋風訪台謝粉絲
04 Nov 2019, 22:24 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社記者楊明珠東京4日專電）日本「偶像製造機」傑尼斯事務所旗下的5人組天團「嵐」為紀念出道20週年，昨天在東京舉行記者會，宣布將於9日到11日間造訪雅加達、台北等城市，感謝歌迷20年來的支持。
「嵐」（ARASHI）由大野智、櫻井翔、相葉雅紀、二宮和也、松本潤5人組成，被認為比他們的5名師兄組成的天團SMAP還要吸金。SMAP於2016年底解散，今年初「嵐」宣布將於明年12月31日休團，2021年起各自單飛，成員的動向備受矚目。
「嵐」昨天上午在全球直播記者會表示，「嵐」將邁入第21年，今後的主題訂為「重生」（Reborn）。松本潤說：「心中想了很多想挑戰的事，今後也希望與大家一起向前衝。」
松本潤也說：「我們想比以前更接近粉絲，將我們的活動同步傳達給大家。」
「嵐」宣布開設臉書（Facebook）、IG（Instagram）、推特 （Twitter）、TikTok、微博（weibo）5大社群帳號，昨天上午10時同步開通，從「嵐」的出道曲A・RA・SHI到單曲BRAVE等64曲解禁外，首度進行數位播放的單曲Turning Up於日本時間昨晚7時開播。Turning Up的MV於昨晚9時首播，「嵐」的成員還進聊天室與粉絲互動。


影片來源：ARASHI YouTube頻道

「嵐」在昨天創下多項紀錄，包括YouTube直播同時收看的人數最多有77萬人，創日本新紀錄。昨天下午4時，「嵐」的YouTube頻道訂閱數突破200萬人，刷新日本最快速紀錄。到了昨晚9時，嵐在YouTube首播新曲Turning Up的MV，最多有51萬人同時觀看。
「嵐」的成員預計11月9日到11日之間搭乘專機從東京啟程進行JET STORM活動，9日先至印尼雅加達，10日訪新加坡、泰國曼谷，11日訪問台北，團員將在這4座城市舉行記者會，向海外粉絲打招呼、致謝。
「嵐」於2006年與2008年在台北舉辦過演唱會，知道台灣有很多他們的粉絲。2006年「嵐」曾到曼谷、台北、南韓首爾與粉絲見面。
相葉雅紀宣布：「我們將在世界掀起嵐（風暴）」，除了下週的亞洲4城JET STORM宣傳行動，「嵐」也宣布明年春天將到中國北京舉辦演唱會，5月15、16日在東京新國立競技場，也就是東京奧運主場館舉辦演唱會。
「嵐」成軍於1999年9月15日，同年11月3日出道。「嵐」的日文發音是ARASHI，意思風暴，取團名時就是希望能在世界掀起風暴。（編輯：周永捷）1081104

The 20th anniversary of the departure of Janis’s group, the whirlwind visit to Taiwan
04 Nov 2019, 22:24 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency reporter Yang Mingzhu, Tokyo, 4th) Japan's "Idol Making Machine", a five-member group of the "Idol Making Machine", is a commemorative 20th anniversary of the debut. It was held in Tokyo yesterday and announced that it will visit from 9th to 11th. Cities such as Jakarta and Taipei are grateful to fans for their support over the past 20 years.
"ARASHI" (ARASHI) consists of 5 people including Ohno Satoshi, Sakurai Sho, Ayumi Yaji, Ninomiya Kazuya, and Matsumoto Jun. It is considered to be more attractive than the SMAP of their 5 brothers. SMAP was dissolved at the end of 2016. At the beginning of this year, "岚" announced that it will be retired on December 31 next year. Since 2021, they have been flying solo. The members' attention has attracted much attention.
"岚" said in a global live press conference yesterday morning that "岚" will enter the 21st year and the theme for the future will be "Reborn". Matsumoto said: "I have thought a lot about what I want to challenge, and I hope to move forward with everyone in the future."
Matsumoto also said: "We want to be closer to the fans than before, and we will communicate our activities to everyone."
"岚" announced the opening of Facebook, IG (Instagram), Twitter (Twitter), TikTok, Weibo (weibo) five community accounts, synchronized at 10 am yesterday, the debut from "岚" A RA, SHI to the single song BRAVE and other 64 songs banned, the first digital playback of the Turning Up single at 7 o'clock in Japan time last night. Turning Up's MV premiered at 9pm last night, and members of the "岚" also entered the chat room to interact with fans.


Source: ARASHI YouTube Channel

"岚" set a number of records yesterday, including a maximum of 770,000 people watching YouTube live broadcasts, setting a new record in Japan. At 4 o'clock yesterday afternoon, "岚"'s YouTube channel subscription exceeded 2 million, setting the fastest record in Japan. At 9 o'clock last night, I sang the new MV of Turning Up on YouTube, and at most 510,000 people watched it at the same time.
Members of the "岚" are expected to take a special plane from Tokyo to JET STORM from November 9th to 11th, first to Jakarta in Indonesia on the 9th, to Singapore in Singapore on the 10th, and to Taipei in Thailand on the 11th. The members will be here. The city held a press conference to greet and thank overseas fans.
"岚" held concerts in Taipei in 2006 and 2008, knowing that Taiwan has many of their fans. In 2006, "岚" met with fans in Bangkok, Taipei, and Seoul, South Korea.
Aiba Yoshiki announced: "We will set off a storm in the world". In addition to next week's Asian 4 city JET STORM publicity campaign, "岚" also announced that it will hold a concert in Beijing, China next spring, May 15 and 16 The Tokyo New National Arena, the main stadium of the Tokyo Olympics, will hold a concert.
"岚" became a military on September 15, 1999, and on November 3 of the same year. The Japanese pronunciation of "岚" is ARASHI, meaning storm. When I take the name of the group, I hope to set off a storm in the world. (Editor: Zhou Yongjie) 1081104
